doc.after: Nigeria is a religiously diverse society with Islam and Christianity being the most widely professed religions According to recent estimates 50 of Nigeria s population adheres to Islam mainly Sunni Christianity is practiced by 48 of the population 74 Protestant 25 Catholic 1 other Christian 151 Adherents of Animism and other religions collectively represent 1 4 of the population 150
